title: Healthcare Recruiting Support
job_overview:
About the role:

Ten80Ten is seeking a proactive, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support our client’s healthcare recruiting efforts, with an initial focus on sourcing and engaging Nurse Practitioners (NP) candidates for in-home health roles.

Key Responsibilities:
- Source NP candidates using LinkedIn, Indeed and other tools
- Verify location fit (within 30-mile zip radius), credentials, and licensure
- Write and send outreach emails and follow-ups
- Track candidates in Google Sheets and/or ATS platforms
- Assist with scheduling and pipeline coordination

Qualification:
- 1-2 years in recruiting, sourcing, or VA work experience (healthcare preferred)
- Skilled in LinkedIn, spreadsheets, and basic research
- Excellent English (written and verbal)
- Detail-oriented, proactive, and tech-savvy
- Familiarity with tools like Loxo, Dripify, or Bullhorn is a plus

To apply, click the link and fill out the form: Upgrade to see actual info
Note: Direct messages will not be entertained.
